name: Work Horse
description:
A small game where you slave away at various task for your job.  They're mostly meaningless, but the pay is good... enough.  Manage your time to make the most of the day.

m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen

Controls:

  • Moving:
    • W A S D for a qwerty keyboard
    • Bump into a Job, then press space to start work
  • Moving Boxes:
    • Tap the move keys
  • Turning Valves:
    • Spin the mouse
  • Coding:
    • Spam the keyboard

Values:

  • Box Job: 10$
  • Code Job: 5$
  • Valve Job: 1$

Edit 1:
Post Jam Windows and Linux builds have been added.
The only real change is the high score is properly saved.
